messages.not-permission: {PREFIX}{RED}Apparently you do not have permissions to execute this action.
messages.player.not-online: {PREFIX} Oops, apparently the player ({PLAYER-NAME}) is not connected to the server!
messages.global.mute.is-enabled: {PREFIX}You can't speak, global chat has been disabled!
messages.lang.applied-fail: {PREFIX}{RED}An error has occurred changing your language!
messages.command.lang-list: {PREFIX} Use: </lang list> to see the list of available languages
messages.server.connect.error-1: {PREFIX}{RED}You are already connected to this server!
messages.server.connect.error-2: {PREFIX}{RED}Apparently this server is not a Lobby!
messages.server.connect.error-3:
{PREFIX}{YELLOW}This server is not yet available on our network!
We will notify on our discord server when we are going to open a new modality.
messages.server.connect.error-4: {PREFIX}{RED}This server has reached its maximum player capacity, and apparently you don't have permission to enter!
messages.queue.player-exist: {PREFIX}{RED}You are already in a queue to enter the {WHITE}{SERVER-NAME}{RED} server!
messages.queue.player-added:
{PREFIX}{GREEN}You have entered the queue to enter the {WHITE}{SERVER-NAME}{GREEN} server.
You are in the position {POSITION-QUEUE}
